coconut@beach.name: coconut
coconut@beach.desc[0]: A hairy coconut has fallen from a palm tree, and rests here.

fruit@beach.name: fruit
fruit@beach.desc[0]: Some sweet smelling fruit is here.

yacht@beach.name: yacht
yacht@beach.desc[0]: The famed Savannah Jane is here, she is a beauty of a sailingship.

basket@beach.name: basket
basket@beach.desc[0]: A large picnic basket is here, maybe it has some goodies in it!

chicken@beach.name: chicken
chicken@beach.desc[0]: Some tasty looking fried chicken is here, making your mouth water.

evening_gloves@beach.name: evening_gloves
evening_gloves@beach.examine: Long and black, these elbow length gloves will enhance your appearance.
evening_gloves@beach.desc[0]: A pair of elegant looking gloves has been dropped here.

beach19@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach19@beach.description:
This is a calm beautiful sea, the sun casts its rays upon these smooth, calm,
open, waters and reflects back into your eyes, as a stunning orange image.
To the south, there is a harbour, from here it looks quiet, and peaceful,
you are sure it would be a wonderful place to visit.

beach14@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach14@beach.description:
This is a calm beautiful sea, the sun casts its rays upon these smooth, calm,
open, waters and reflects back into your eyes, as a stunning orange image.
There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and
smooth, and the sailing is wonderful.

beach18@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach18@beach.description:
This is a calm beautiful sea, the sun casts its rays upon these smooth, calm,

There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and

There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and

beach4@beach.title: Beach
beach4@beach.description:
This is the secluded northern end of the beach.  For those people who 
are weary of the sun, there is a crop of tropical trees and bushes that help 
cast a cool shadow over a nearby picnic bench.

beach23@beach.title: Paradise
beach23@beach.description:
This paradise seems to good to be true, its beauty and spendor take your 
breath away.  Everything is peaceful here, much diffrent than the savage
lands you are used to.

beach27@beach.title: Paradise
beach27@beach.description:
This island paradise has could be a goldmine! You are sure that visitors from 
allover the lands would visit here, and visit often, the islands breathtaking
beauty has you hooked, thats for sure.  Maybe you should retire from your 
exploring, and work as a guide, showing travelers the beauties of this 
wonderful island.

beach20@beach.title: One Particular Harbour
beach20@beach.description:
Here you have reached a harbour, the air is sweet, and filled with the
laughter of children.  The dock here is small but elegant, and the dock hand
easily guides the Savannah Jane to her dock.  Looking inland you see a small
town, filled with peace.  The children here play on the shore here, and all is
safe.  You may never want to leave.

beach10@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach10@beach.description:
This is a calm beautiful sea, the sun casts its rays upon these smooth, calm,
open, waters and reflects back into your eyes, as a stunning orange image.
There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and
smooth, and the sailing is wonderful.

beach6@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach6@beach.description:
This is a calm beautiful sea, the sun casts its rays upon these smooth, calm,
open, waters and reflects back into your eyes, as a stunning orange image.
There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and
smooth, and the sailing is wonderful.

beach24@beach.title: Paradise
beach24@beach.description:
This tropical island you have discovered is everything you ever dreamed, 
small, quiet, and beautiful, you just might never want to leave.

beach5@beach.title: Beach
beach5@beach.description:
This is a secluded edge of the beach, receded slightly from the incoming 
tide.  From here you can see the entire beach, and what a marvelous sight it is.
Off to the north just a bit further, is a small dock, and past that to
the north is what appears to be a picnic area. Hungry?

beach25@beach.title: Paradise
beach25@beach.description:
The island continues to west and north from here, it's sights are so pleasant,
and your worries are gone.  Just relax, and take in your surroundings.

beach9@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach9@beach.description:

There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and

There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and

beach26@beach.title: Paradise
beach26@beach.description:
Ohh no! You though you spotted a large evil monster, but turning to look, all 
you saw was a trick shadow, nothing here will harm you, you are safe here.

beach8@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach8@beach.description:
This is a calm beautiful sea, the sun casts its rays upon these smooth, calm,
open, waters and reflects back into your eyes, as a stunning orange image.
There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and
smooth, and the sailing is wonderful.

beach22@beach.title: Paradise
beach22@beach.description:
This is a dense, tropical paradise.  Birds sing, and fly from tree to tree,
playing the games that birds play.

beach7@beach.title: Beautiful sea
beach7@beach.description:
This is a calm beautiful sea, the sun casts its rays upon these smooth, calm,
open, waters and reflects back into your eyes, as a stunning orange image.
There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and
smooth, and the sailing is wonderful.

There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and

beach15@beach.description:

open, waters and reflects back into your eyes, as a stunning orange image.
There is nothing here that would cause you fear, the waters are calm, and

beach21@beach.title: Paradise
beach21@beach.description:
As you leave the harbour town, this small island turns into a jungle of sorts
you can hear parents calling thier children in for dinner, and the sounds of
the harbour town in the distance, and a feeling of peace envelopes you.

beach3@beach.title: Beach
beach3@beach.description:
What more is there to say about this wonderful place that you thought 
existed in your dreams only?  It's splendor and beauty would make this an 
exellent place to retire from your travels. There is a small dock here to
launch boats into the calm waters.

beach2@beach.title: Beach
beach2@beach.description:
The beach continues to the north and west here.  It's nice warm sand, 
and smooth wave rolling in, give you such a great feeling of peace, and
romance, your heart longs for the one you love.

beach1@beach.title: Beach
beach1@beach.description:
This is a patch of beach that extends to the north and south.
The waves from the sea to the east come rolling gently in, making
you feel calm, and careless. Maybe you could take you shoes off
and walk barefoot in the sand.  Or even better, wiggle your toes in
the soft, warm sand.

whale@beach.name: whale
whale@beach.description: A large humpbacked whale is here, enjoying the calm open water.

dove@beach.name: dove
dove@beach.description: A peaceful white dove is perched here, resting.

finch@beach.name: finch
finch@beach.description: A lovely long-tailed finch is perched on a tree here.

flamingo@beach.name: flamingo
flamingo@beach.description: There is a large pink flamingo here, looking for food

parrot@beach.name: parrot
parrot@beach.description: A beautiful parrot is here, maybe you could teach him to talk?

porpoise@beach.name: porpoise
porpoise@beach.description: A playful porpoise is here, playing some games.

cockatiel@beach.name: cockatiel
cockatiel@beach.description: A bright Cockatiel is here, looking beautiful.
